page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: 22nd May {Sylvia Barrett}and myself{ {Marie Pitt}went out to Newbold, and we went to three people's houses, and talked to people we knew. We went and asked them some questions. All of the people had{telephones, gardens and {garages.}None had open fires, all of them had semi-detacted houses. All of them had toilets upstairs, all we interviewed lived up{Main Road.}Most of them had 2 or 3 bedrooms, 6 to 10 rooms and pattio's at the back. All of them had bathrooms upstairs. None of them had cellars, and they all had attics. All the houses were modern. Most of them had a big house.
